name: Coworker
text: I saw something HILARIOUS on Instagram the other day, wanna see?

name: Coworker
text: You gotta see it; it’s so good.

name: Coworker
text: Here, wait, let me pull it up.

name: Coworker
text: Maybe the reception in here isn’t good…

name: Coworker
text: Could I get your Insta? I can send it to you after work today.

name: Coworker
text: Ugh.. why is there no service here? Maybe if I move around...
